jobs.description:
I have worked on the cloud applications, highly scaled hosted application on the education domain. 

Function in a project team setting.
Responsible to provide realistic estimates for his and his team tasks and achieve On-time Delivery.
Strong and effective interpersonal and communication skills and the ability to interact with prompt and professionalism to the teams across different time zones.
Efficient communication of issues/risks/concerns to leads, architects or managers.
Served as the Architect’s delegate within the team/platform to propagate design/architectural consistency.
Provides input on estimates and achieve on-time Delivery.
Optimum utilization of engineering tools and technologies to maintain a high productivity level in the team.
driving technology competencies for the organization including initiatives / task force activities
Ensure that code artifacts produced, are of the highest quality, conforming to set or agreed upon standard. Should advocate such consistency to all members of the team.

I worked as a engineer, senior engineer and team lead for web development application on .NET stack.
1. Requirement gathering, Application design, Application development and deployment.
2. Performance tuneups, fixing security breaches.
3. Development team forming and rampingup,
I worked a associate engineer on Microsoft development stack.

general.headline: Tech Lead at 99X Technology | Cloud Consultant | Speaker
general.description:
Manoj graduated with a First-Class degree in Information Technology(Hons) from University of Moratuwa. He competent consultant at Scalable Cloud Architectures, Docker Containers, DevOps, and Serverless. During his leisure time, he does a lot of hacking around Serverless and Serverless based development models. He continuously updates video content on Cloud Architecture on his youtube channel - https://www.youtube.com/awsvideos 

He is a blogger at medium.com and he usually blogs about Cloud Architecture patterns - https://medium.com/@manojf. He also blogs at his personal website https://awsvideos.com 

He is the author of Serverless React Boilerplate (https://github.com/99xt/serverless-react-boilerplate) which got featured at Serverless repository (https://github.com/serverless/serverless). He has contributed to many Open Source projects such as Serverless Dynamodb Local Plugin, Pdf2S3, Serverless Delivery Framework and Serverless Dynamodb Localhost.

He is an excellent problem-solver, able to quickly grasp complex systems and identify opportunities for improvements and resolutions of critical issues with more than three years of experience in software engineering. He is adept in;
* Working closely with system analysts, engineers, programmers and business stakeholders to design solutions and to obtain information on project limitation and capabilities, performance requirements and interfaces. 
* Experience on Cloud Architectures, Serverless and DevOps and Event Driven Programming.
* Experience on Single Page Application Development with REST APIs.
* Performance optimization, software architecture and implementation coordination

Specialties: 
AWS Cloud Architectures, Containerization, Build and Release Automation, Web Frontend, and Backend development, Hybrid Mobile development, Agile/Scrum/Kanban/Lean, Angular / React/ VueJs

jobs.description:
CustomizerLK is the one and only Sri Lankan web site which provides online t-shirt customization capability. If you want your own t-shirt with your own design, we can produce it for you and deliver it out in less than 7 business days. Our design tools make t-shirt designing easy and fun! So create your masterpiece with Customizerlk and experience the real difference of us. Quality of printing has been guaranteed over years and that is why we have the largest customer base in Sri Lanka. 
Printing customized T shirts is our expertized domain. We are offering number of categories of T shirts for you to customize. You can choose designs from our exclusive Design ideas or you can design it by your own. Print it with your favorite material and colors.

general.headline: Tech Lead at 99X Technology
general.description: Supun is an agile practitioner who always uncovers better ways of developing software and helping others to do it. He continuously learns new technologies, researches better ways of solving technical problems and coaches his team members to perform their best. His technical leadership and development skills enabled him to contribute to the organization not only through building software but through building people.

jobs.description:
•	Contributed to the architecture of the DuoWorld product by providing solutions related to performance, scalability, extensibility, and availability.
•	Conducted R&D to identify the best architectural patterns to develop the cloud based platform as a service (PaaS) - DuoWorld
•	Involved in the recruitment process by interviewing candidates.
•	Played the role of the acting scrum master and conducted daily scrum meetings occasionally.
•	Coached and mentored junior developers to improve their coding skills and to follow best development practices.
•	Conducted code reviews of team members.
•	Provided training and guidance to external developers to use the DuoWorld PaaS
•	Developed the PaaS using programming languages such as JavaScript, Golang, PHP and Python.

•	Conducted R&D to migrate from .NET to Open Source (FOSS) technologies, and
      introduce the best practices to develop the new components of the product.
      

    •	Contributed to development for the Duo v5.1 by developing its core components
      
      such as ObjectStore, Service Console, Framework Server, and Process Sche

... See more

•	Involved in maintaining the existing product DuoSubscribe v4.9 by fixing bugs and
      adding new features for the Billing Component.
      

    •	Introduced a framework and for the new product DuoSubscrive v5 for Silverlight
      

    
      •	Developed software with .NET technologies such as WCF, Silverlight, ASP.

... See more

projects.description:
Duo World PaaS
Jan 2015 – Present

Project descriptionPaaS that enables the developers to develop business apps and publish on Duo Marketplace which enables other duo world users (non-developers) to purchase apps according to their business requirements. 

This platform consists of a collection of propriotery middleware, SDK, and UI frameworks that enables the developers to develop cloud based solutions. The platform emphasizes on scalability, security, usability and extensibility features.

Other creators
Lasitha Senanayake Sajeetharan Sinnathurai Shehan Tissera Binara Goonawardana Eshwaran Veerabahu Prasad Jayashanka Sutharsan Sundaramoorthy 4+
Project nameCarbite - A PHP Microframework for REST Services
May 2016

Project descriptionCarbite is an open source ultra-lightweight micro framework written in PHP that enables the developer to write REST based Web Services. This framework enables the developer to efficiently and rapidly write REST services for their front end web applications. I initiated this project and released under LGPL licence. For more information visit the following URL

https://github.com/supuncodes/carbite

See project Carbite - A PHP Microframework for REST ServicesSee project
Project nameCoconut.JS - A MVVM framework for JavaScript
May 2016

Project descriptionCoconut.JS enables the JavaScript developer to write data-centric MVVM web applications using vanilla JavaScript. It aims to address technical issued related to maintainability and simplicity. I initiated this open source project and released under LGPL licence. For more information visit the following URL.

https://github.com/supuncodes/coconut.js

See project Coconut.JS - A MVVM framework for JavaScriptSee project
Project nameObject Store Server
Dec 2014

Project descriptionObject Store is a middleware for the Mambati platform that enables the developers to perform CRUD operations on various data stores (i.e. Relational, NoSQL, FTP, Hadoop HDFS) using a standard set of REST endpoints. This component provides extensibility features to add support for data stores such as Elastic Search, Couchbase, Cassandra, MongoDB, MySQL, Hive, etc... This middleware is can be customized to work with only a specified set of data stores (i.e. to handle CRUD operations only with Elastic Search and Couchbase) The middleware is written using golang.

Other creators
Prasad Jayashanka Lasitha Senanayake
Project nameCloud Event Bus
Nov 2014

Project descriptionCloud Event Bus is a middleware that facilitates the coordination between entities such as users and middleware components. This component uses event driven architecture which subscribers can listen to events which can be triggered by any entity. Provides functionality to handle global configuration, global state, monitor output of middleware, chat between users, and WebRTC for video conferencing.

Other creators
Lasitha Senanayake Kalana Demel
Project nameUiMicrokernel
Nov 2014

Project descriptionProvides interfaces for app developers to develop fronted business apps that exposes features of Mambati platform such as manipulating data using Duo Object Store, execution of applications inside a shell, event management through cloud event bus, WebRTC video conferencing and chat functionality, etc... Developed using Angular.JS framework and inspired by the Microkernel architecture of Operating Systems.
Other creators
Lasitha Senanayake Eshwaran Veerabahu Dilshan Liyanage
Project nameDuo Object Store DSL (Domain Specific Language)
Jan 2014

Project descriptionDuo Object Store is designed to integrate with heterogeneous databases such as NoSQL and Relational while providing developers a Domain Specific Language (DSL) that enables the developers to store/query/delete C# objects in Duo Object Store that stores objects in such heterogeneous data sources. This approach enables the developer to migrate between different data sources without changing the business logic.

Designed and developed a Domain Specific Language (DSL) which is built on top of LINQ that interacts with Duo Object Store framework that integrates with different data sources.

Other creators
Lasitha Senanayake Chinthaka Thiyambarawatte
Project nameAPIs Developed for DuoV5 Framework/SDK
Project descriptionDesigned and developed an API that provides localization for DuoV5 apps. A mechanism was developed to create and load language packs. The API also enables the developers to switch between languages during runtime.

Designed and developed a SIP (Session Initiation Protocol) API for the DuoV5 framework that in order to receive voice calls that use a 3rd party browser plugin PortSIP. This API encapsulates the underlying communication while allowing the developers to easily use SIP features.

Designed and developed an XMPP (Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol) API for Silverlight in order to provide XMPP chat features for DuoV5 apps. BOSH protocol was used to provide two way communications between the DuoV5 Framework and the XMPP server.

Designed and developed a mechanism to address the problem of nested service calls in Silverlight by allowing the developers to refactor their code in a workflow like hierarchy.
Project nameDuo Framework Server
Project descriptionThe objective of Duo Framework server is to provide two way communication facilities between the frontend and the backend servers.

Designed and developed mechanism to enable the use of multiple protocols such as Web Sockets, HTTP Polling, and TCP.

Designed and developed a mechanism to recover client connections from network breakdowns to provide high availability and fault tolerance.
Other creator
Sudharshan Balakrishnan
Project nameDuo Installer
Project descriptionThe objective of Duo Installer is to automate the release and deployment process of WCF services, backend servers, DuoV5 Framework, and apps created for DuoV5 Framework.

Developed a packaging component known as Setup Creator that enabled the Release Engineer to package all the components and create an installer package. This tool creates a snapshot of an ideal database and all the files of the components and packages everything to a single zip file.

Developed a tool to install and update components of the system which are packaged by the Setup Creator. A mechanism was developed to track DB changes, track component changes and to apply such changes by auto generating DB scripts, and by upgrading necessary files of the components. Another mechanism was developed to automate the deployment of WCF services in IIS, as well as to automatically change WCF client endpoint URLs in web.config.
Other creators
Sudharshan Balakrishnan Chinthaka Thiyambarawatte Lasitha Senanayake
Project nameDuo Search API
Project descriptionThe objective of Duo Search API is to provide full text searching capabilities to WCF services in the while reducing the number of database calls. The API allows the developers to add, edit, delete and search objects from an index. The index can be configured to use a distributed search server or to store in local hard drive.

Designed and developed an API for distributed searching that uses Elastic Search.

Designed and developed an API for local indexing that uses Lucene.NET.
Project nameDuo Service Console
Project descriptionThe objectives of service console are to schedule jobs and perform operations on large data sets.
Designed and developed a framework to develop various operations to address business requirements that can be performed on large data sets.

Designed and developed a mechanism break a large excel file into smaller parts and perform bulk operations in a multi-threaded environment.

Designed and developed a mechanism to schedule the operations developed by the API.
Other creators
Lasitha Senanayake Sudharshan Balakrishnan
Project nameDuo V5 Silverlight Framework/SDK
Project descriptionThe purpose of DuoV5 Framework/SDK is to provide a platform to develop various frontend functionalities to address business requirements. Such functionaries include forms, designers, etc… Such functionalities are known as apps in Duo V5 framework.

Designed and developed a mechanism that enabled developers to develop their apps, compile to DLL files and host in IIS. This approach reduced the Silverlight XAP file size, enabled modularization of components, allowed components to be changed, added or removed with less effort.

Designed and developed a host for the apps to be downloaded and displayed in Silverlight. That included an attractive frontend, and provided extensive usability and user experience. 

Designed and developed an emulator that enabled to develop, debug, and test Duo V5 apps separately outside of the main Silverlight host. In order to use the emulator a set of visual studio templates were created that are configured specifically for the emulator. 

Developed a Visual Studio add in that enabled the developers to publish their compiled apps.

Other creators
Lasitha Senanayake Chinthaka Thiyambarawatte Sudharshan Balakrishnan Sajeetharan Sinnathurai Eshwaran Veerabahu
Project nameDuo World DevStudio
Project descriptionIDE that enables the developers to develop business apps for the duo world platform. Enables the developers to focus more on developing apps using features provided by Mambati platform. Consists of features such as GitHub integration, project sharing between users, app publishing for the Duo World Marketplace.

allSkills: WCF, LINQ, ASP.NET, Web Services, Software Engineering, Unit Testing, Big Data, Data Mining, Cloud Computing, Software Development, Entity Framework, C#, WPF, Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, Linux, HTML 5, Angular.JS, UML, Node.JS, ASP.NET MVC, Docker, Android SDK, Hadoop, NoSQL, ADO.NET, CSS, HTML5, Windows Communication Foundation (WCF), Java Enterprise Edition, Unified Modeling Language (UML), Cascading Style Sheets (CSS), Silverlight, WF, Golang, Apache Cordova, XMPP, Enterprise Design Patterns, ElasticSearch, J2EE Application Development, Framework Design, Domain Specific Languages, Web Frameworks, Usability Engineering, Real Time Monitoring, Architectural Patterns

general.headline: Tech Lead
general.description:
More than 5 years of programming and software development experience. Seeking a challenging
software development opportunity in a dynamic environment where innovation, education and a sense of ownership are valued and encouraged.

Currently involved in iPhone/iPad and Android application development.
Vast experience in iOS 6,7 & 8

jobs.description:
Responsible for implementation and development of software systems and have an excellent understanding of the final goal and the customer requirement. Provide the team with a vision of the project objectives, communicate clear instructions to team members. Also Facilitate problem solving and collaboration and coordinate with internal and external customers as necessary. Familiarize the team with the customer needs, specifications, design targets, the development process, design standards, techniques and tools to support task performance. Assure that the team addresses all relevant issues within the specifications and various standards. Ensure deliverable are prepared to satisfy the project requirements and schedule. Keep the project manager informed of task accomplishment, issues and status. Escalate issues which cannot be resolved by the team and provide guidance to the team based on management direction. Assure that the team addresses all relevant issues within the specifications and various standards.
Responding promptly and professionally to bug reports and respond promptly to the requests/modifications/inquiries made by the client. Proactively assist the team to deliver the change requests. Assist the project manager for time estimations, during the project planning stage. Communicate the status of the tasks on a daily basis to the Project Manager during the scrum meeting.
Assist/guide/mentor junior programmers.
Document code consistently throughout the development process by listing a description of the program, special instructions, and any changes made in database tables on procedural, modular and database level. Tests new programs to ensure that logic and syntax are correct, and that program results are accurate.

Responsible for the technical development, debugging, and delivery of best- in-class mobile applications (iOS and Android).   Work across a wide range of projects, each with specific functional and feature requirements.  Collaborate closely with product managers, user interface designers, platform engineers, and multiple groups across CBS to define and implement product features.  Build high-level user interfaces using rapid prototyping methodologies.  Design application frameworks for use across the multiple products. 
Work with internal technical teams to identify and build platform elements required to support key mobile product features.  Evaluate opportunities to bring new product features and content to mobile users from a technical perspective. Build strong working relationships with coworkers, customers (internal and external), and company management

Design and build advanced applications for the iOS platform. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features. Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability. Work on bug fixing and improving application performance. Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency. Implementing custom native interfaces using the latest iOS programming techniques and building reusable iOS software components for iPhone applications. Analyzing and optimizing application code for efficiency and performance.

projects.description:
Product Friend
Aug 2016

Project descriptionDo you have a dusty folder overflowing with worn receipts from years of purchases? ProductFriend stores your product purchase and warranty information in the cloud for you to access anytime, anywhere – for free!
Remove the hassles of painful warranty claims by having easy access to your product information in one place when you need it most.

Add your receipts, new or old, by simply taking photos and saving them into ProductFriend. Share your experience with others by rating your products. Set helpful reminders to ensure you never miss a warranty expiry date again!

Features:
- Easily add new or old products with important purchase and warranty information.
- Set reminders to help you avoid unexpected expired warranties.
- Share your experience by rating your product for others to see.
- Get access to support information for a range of products where possible. 
And we’re constantly adding new exciting features!

Other creator
Kasun Dananjaya Delgolla
See project Product FriendSee project
Project nameE.Art.T
Apr 2015

Project descriptionE.Art.T is the first application (Android & iOS) made for European art collectors, dedicated enthusiasts, and cultural tourists. E.Art.T will guide you to all the art destinations in the selected city. In this version we support Brussels, London, Paris and Munich. More cities will soon be added.

How can you reduce time and energy planning an art-filled visit to your favourite city? With the E.Art.T application, you will have access to all the important information for the world of contemporary art, ancient and modern art, antiques, and design.

Other creators
Umanga Sarathchandra Heshan Sandeepa Ishan Weerasooriya Logeish Rooban
Project nameInstant App
Nov 2014

Project descriptionInstant App provides dynamic front end which can be used to manage the data and structure of popular mobile applications in Sri Lanka like Iraj, TNL Onstage, Wickramarachchi Opticians, Urban Kitchen and Kama Colombo.

Other creators
Heshan Sandeepa Ishan Weerasooriya Logeish Rooban Harsha Dissanayake
Project nameClipCast Soccer & ClipCast Weddings
Oct 2014

Project descriptionClipCast Technologies provide a cloud based video editing service to create highlights for youth soccer games. It aims to promote and facilitate youth soccer. The soccer teams can use content captured from mobile devices, camcorders and automatically create video clips for the relevant moments. The clips generated for the highlights can be shared among anyone, and can be viewed on web browsers, smart TVs, and mobile devices. 

The video editing service is available through subscription, and the team manager of a particular soccer team can purchase this service. The parents, players, coaches of the team can be invited, and they can download the application through app store/google play, install the application, record, tag at the game and view and enjoy the clips.

Similarly ClipCast Weddings facilitates capturing video, photographs, while tagging the memorable moments throughout your special day. This service is available for couples & planners. This mobile application facilitates to send invitations to the guest list, upload content related to the wedding such as the menu, location, agenda, invited guests/couple can record their wedding day, tag the special moments, view and enjoy the clips/photos.

jobs.description:
 Micros-Oracle Restaurant Enterprise Solutions (C++/C#.NET): Developing applications to be used in Restaurants. Compatible with Win32 devices, Tablets, Smart Phones and other hand held devices. Maintaining the current codebase, bug fixing and adding new enhancements to the projects.

 Sonic Credit Card Driver Development (C++): Developing a new credit card driver to support a new payment gateway added to the Sonic Hotel chain.

 Kitchen Display System Application Development (C++): Developing applications to run on Kitchen Display systems in order to display the orders rung from various places.

 VBS2StrikeDeveloper (Java): Developing d a Java API to expose the functions of VBS2Strike application.

 VBSMedia (C++): Developing an application to stream the VBS2 Game Engine’s UI to different clients. (Only HTTP compatible)

 RTSP Server implementation for VBSMedia (C++): Research and Development work to implement RTSP/HTTP support for VBSMedia.

 Mesh Simplification and Behavioural Changes for AIWorld (C++): Simplification of maps of VBS2 Engine and adding behavioural changes for AIWorld.

 SimVBS (C++): Developed a tool to emulate the behavior of VBS2 Game Engine without graphics.

 SimLogger (C++): Developed a reusable logger using C++ Boost library to be used in all C++ applications within the company.

 VBS2FiresDeveloper (Java): Developed a Java API to expose the functions of VBS2Fires application.

 VBS2FiresFusion (C++): Developed a C++ API to communicate with VBS2FiresDeveloper Java API.

 Traffic Light Module (C++): Involved in developing traffic light module for Pattern of Life Project.

 Mesh Decimation (C++): Implemented Mesh Decimation for maps in VBS2 Game Engine using VTK Library.

 RDA Southern Expressway Ticketing Solution(C, Java, JSP& Servlet, MySQL) : Implemented ticketing solution for Southern Expressway project. Barcode reading, NFC card payments, OTA data download and upload handled in the front end POS machine. Backend implemented using Java Sockets, MySQL and JSP.

 Private Bus Ticketing Solution & SLTB Bus Ticketing Solution(C, Java, JSP & Servlet, MySQL): Implemented Ticketing solution for both special and normal routes. NFC payments, OTA data download and upload supported.

 M-Token(C): Developed front end for Movie ticket reservation system in corporation with EAP movies and Dialog Axiata. Implemented in Savoy Cinema and MC Cinema.

 Touch Travel Pass(C, Java, JSP& Servlet and MySQL): Carried out initial Research and development of prepaid touch travel card to be used in Private buses and to replace the traditional season cards.

Project descriptionOctopus FoodPOS operates as standalone or as part of an octopus server module.
The Octopus server module enable business owners to set up multiple desktop or ipad terminals wirelessly and to handle kitchen requests by sending orders wirelessly to the kithen/drink bar the connected printer.

An ideal choice for small Food and Beverages outlets. Coupled with transaction management and daily reporting, it makes an ideal utility for the cashier and a powerful tool for the outlet manages.

-Easy order tracking

Created Edit and Delete food items.

Aug 2013

Project descriptionOctopus RetailPOS Operates in isolation or as part of an Octopus Server module.
The Octopus server module enable business owners to set up multiple desktop or ipad terminals and self-checkout counters wirelessly. Works well with bluetooth scanner.

Octopus Mobile Point of Sales allows users to keep track sales and customers, have instant access to your sell through data, best customers and payment listings.

-Sales
Easily record your sales in the sales module. Enter in customer's details as well as the goods purchased and proceed to record your transaction.

-Products
Administer creation of new products, For ease of data entry, use the camera scanning ability to record international barcodes.

-System Administrations.
Set your preferences accordingly such as tax computation, invoice number prefix and so on.

-Customer
Add customers either from your contact list or create new customers easily.

-Reports
View your sales for the day as well as your sell through at one glance.

Project nameMTBS for Anagram Securities India
Apr 2008 – Apr 2011

Project descriptionMubasher Total Brokerage Solution (MTBS) for Anagram securities provided an order management system (OMS) and a market data dissemination system which supported equity and derivatives trading. This was integrated with National Stock Exchange of India (NSE) and Bombay Stock exchange (BSE).

- Design and development of market data feed analyzers for NSE and BSE.
- Development STP Server which routes orders for NSE and BSE.
- Design and development of front end using MFC for controlling and monitoring backend servers.
- Development of NSE and BSE exchange simulators for internal testing.
- Developed a C++ API for Java Message Service (JMS) using Java Native Interface (JNI).
- Design and development of a Win32 dynamic link library component in C++ which provides report generation and calculation logic for C#.net trading front. 
- Work collaboratively with technical teams from exchanges and the client during system integrations and requirement identification. 
- Actively involve during NSE and BSE production certification process.
- Troubleshooting and maintenance of production system.
Other creators
Duminda Ranasinghe Dasun Perera Ravindra Bandara  Lakmal Prasanga  Lelum Ranasinghe Madugalle 8+
Project nameOMS India
May 2008 – Feb 2011

Project descriptionWas a core member of Order Management Systems (OMS) for Anagram Securities (Pvt) Ltd at India, by Direct Technologies (Pvt) Ltd. OMS is a system developed to put orders to different stock exchanges in an efficient and least risk manner. Clients and dealers use OMSs to put orders for various types of securities and they are able to track the progress of each order throughout the system. This is one of the company’s main projects. Developed OMS is a J2EE application which is deployed on JBOSS Server. This project was gigantic since there had supporting server components for the OMS, monitoring components to monitor all the servers and Simulation components. I was responsible for Order Routing specific coding for INSE, IBSE equity and derivative stock exchanges and other server side work for financial risk management and customer management specific development. Was also responsible for providing service to the Web Clients and thick C# based UI clients. I also got involvement in integration with Anagram back office. Has two years of server side development as one of the key member of the OMS India project. On three occasions have been involved in onsite development and customer handling which counts to more than 8 months. I joined this project as a junior member and worked as the team lead after Ravindra and Buddhika migrated.
Used Technologies : J2EE, J2SE, JMX, Spring MVC, JCache and ORACLE
Other creators
Ravindra Bandara Buddhika Semasinghe Dasun Perera  Chathuranga Jayamal Kalana Sandhana
Project nameKethaKa - 2D barcode Image Processing API
Jul 2007

Project descriptionKethaKa is an Application Programming Interface for developing bar-code applications using the PDF417 two dimensional bar-code standards. It provides convenience for developers to encoding information into two dimensional PDF417 bar-codes and decoding a PDF417 bar-code to retrieve encoded information. 
Two dimensional bar-codes are emerging ahead of one dimensional bar-codes because of their ability to hold data unlike the one dimensional bar-code which requires an external data store. The project implements error correction capability as defined in the standard for accurate data retrieval. 

Technologies used: C++, C# , OpenCV
Other creators
Charith Nidarsha  Janandith Jayawardena

projects.description:
Did - The Calendar is the Timesheet
Aug 2010 – Present

Project descriptionDid™ simply leverages what you already use: your calendar in Microsoft Outlook. Did knows about your customers and your projects and uses the information in your calendar appointments to build your timesheet. Did™ does not make use of any custom plugins for Outlook, but supports simple conventions to allow you to make sure the timesheet is completed automatically. 

Did™ builds on standard Outlook functionality such as categories and private marking. Your privates will never be seen in Did, and personal appointments you'd like your colleagues to see, you'll just tag it with a category to have Did™ will automatically ignore it.

With Did™ the Outlook calendar is now your primary tool for completing your timesheets. All you need to do is to make sure that your schedule is accurate.​

Other creators
Mads Nissen Milan Chauhan Mikael Svenson Indika Rathnasekara Andreas Eide Sachintana Dissanayake Christian Manholt 2+
